control.name: sbInfo
control.description: Displays the form containing information about current filter settings.

control.name: ceAllowFilter
control.description: Enables data filtering and applies a demo filter criteria, set via the FilterInfoProperty. Unchecking this item calls the ClearColumnsFilter that resets all applied filter conditions.

control.name: ceFilterEditor
control.description: Specifies whether Filter Editor is enabled. The Filter Editor allows end-users to build complex filter criteria with an unlimited number of filter conditions, combined by logical operators.

control.name: ceAdvDialog
control.description: The UseNewCustomFilterDialog property specifies whether the advanced custom filter dialog is used instead of the standard one. Advanced filter dialog filter dialog allows you to compare column values with other column values.

control.name: ceFilterList
control.description: Enables or disables the View's MRU filter dropdown list that displays the most recently used filters.

control.name: ceColumnFilterList
control.description: The AllowColumnMRUFilterList property specifies whether recently used filter items are displayed in the Filter dropdowns for columns.
